title: Ex-plat adc lf Silver supp
body: Haven't played for about 2 years before the other day. Was plat 3 many moons ago. won majority of games since i got back just lf a positive support to climb. We will push gold/plat. add me

replies.body:
This guy is a fucking twat! I added him and asked him to play, than he just tells me I type like a monkey than deletes me before I could ask why. Nice one!

 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

haha hey dude welcome back, ye im atually i good sup but need a good adc, i got like 296 k ish mastery points on thresh, and i can go ardens sups, like lulu, karma, raka and rakan. hope we can play coz im tryna get gold too since its near end of season
Added, hope to have a chat.
